news.body: Please report bugs on the Discord ialr-dl2-bug-reporting channel, thanks and happy gaming
Currently the Flamethrowers break the audio due to the 1.15 update, I have to recreate them for them to work properly
Welcome back! The mod has been updated to support Nightmare difficulty, please let me know any specific issues you spot on the Discord IALR-Feedback channel or ialr-dl2-bug-reporting
Check out the Stash > Extras to try out the new Veteran skin or select the Veteran Pathway when starting a new game!
